Package gobblin.publisher

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseDataPublisher
    A basic implementation of SingleTaskDataPublisher that publishes the data from the writer output directory to the final output directory.
    BaseDataPublisherWithHiveRegistration
    An extension of BaseDataPublisher which performs Hive registration after publishing data.
    CommitSequencePublisher
    An implementation of DataPublisher for exactly-once delivery.
    HiveRegistrationPublisher
    A DataPublisher that registers the already published data with Hive.
    JdbcPublisher
    Publishes data into JDBC RDBMS.
    NoopPublisher
    An no-op optimistic publisher that just inspects the state of all workunits that are successful and marks them committed.
    TaskPublisher  
    TaskPublisherBuilder  
    TaskPublisherBuilderFactory  
    TimePartitionedDataPublisher
    For time partition jobs, writer output directory is $GOBBLIN_WORK_DIR/task-output/{extractId}/{tableName}/{partitionPath}, where partition path is the time bucket, e.g., 2015/04/08/15.
    TimestampDataPublisher
    Path expected from writer: {writerfinaldir}/{topicname}/{dbname_tablename_xxxxx} Publisher output path: {publisherfinaldir}/{dbname.tablename}/{currenttimestamp}
    TimestampDataPublisherWithHiveRegistration
    Wrapper for TimestampDataPublisher to publish with HiveRegistrationPublisher afterwards.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    TaskPublisher.PublisherState
